BNP Paribas’ Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) approach allows the Group to take part in building a sustainable future while promoting performance and stability. CSR policy recorded positive results last year, since 12 of the 13 CSR indicators set in 2015 were achieved: the opportunity for BNP Paribas to pursue this good dynamic by setting ambitious challenges for 2018 and reinforcing its CSR actions in a concrete way, to discover in 2015 CSR Report and on the Group’s CSR web pages.
